title: Twister

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Connect a switch to a switch‑accessible spinner.*
• Attach images of the body parts used in Twister to the spinner.
• The switch user presses their switch to spin and select which body part the player must use e.g. right hand, left foot.
• Next attach images of the Twister coloured dots to the spinner.
• The switch user presses their switch again to spin and choose which colour the player must place that body part on e.g. right hand on a green spot.
* If you don’t have a physical spinner, you can use an online spinner instead. There are many free, customisable options available. Use a wired or wireless switch with a switch interface to trigger the spin.

tooltipText: Use a switch accessible spinner to join in on a game of Twister
